thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Wins Two Bids Worth 858.24 Million Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Wins Two Bids Worth 858.24 Million Yuan

organizations.name: brief-zhejiang jingsheng mechanical & electrical wins two bids worth
reuters) - zhejiang jingsheng mechanical & electrical co ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Jingsheng Mechanical & Electrical Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT WINS TWO BIDS WORTH A TOTAL OF 858.24 MILLION YUAN ($131.93 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EvF7Wc Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5051 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
